data.name: Biosensor-Framework
data.description: C# library that handles the full process of gathering biometric data from a body-worn sensor, transforming it into handcrafted feature vectors, and delivering an inferencing result in thirty-five lines of code.

evidence: README indicates network usage: "The library can be installed using the [NuGet package manager](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Biosensor-Framework/) and is listed publicly.  For Unity, downloading the package and importing it through"

“Developed in the Virtual Reality Laboratory at the Munroe Meyer Institute, this library provides an interface for interacting with biosensors and performing affective computing tasks on their output data streams.”

“This library provides the following capabilities: … Collection and delivery of biometric readings to an end user's software application … Microsoft.ML support for inferencing on the feature vectors natively in C# in both multi-class and binary classification tasks”
